Sub: Requirement of BR Helmets: Reg

Itis informed that from January 2024 to January 2025, augmentation of manpower
took place at a no. of airports, due to which actual requirement of BR Helmets at those
airports has also changed.

2. In this regard, the Competent Authority has directed to obtain fresh requirement
of BR Helmets at AAI airports.

3. In view of the above, I have been directed to request Zonal DIsG & DIsG/CASO
ASG Chennai & Kolkata to furnish a consolidated report (Airport wise) in respect of AAT
controlled airports under their respective jurisdiction as per the proforma enclosed as
Appendix-A to this HQ by 07.02.2025 for perusal of the Competent Authority and further
submission to AAI please.

4. Further, while filling the attached proforma, the strength of operational shift should
be mentioned as per the strength sanctioned for one operational shift in the survey. For
any query, please contact SI/Exe Ajay Dhankhar- 9991666878.

5. This issues with the approval of the Competent Authority.

Encl: As above.

(Sudhir-xtrmar)
